title: Blanket 5% infra provisions to hurt both lenders and project viability: Banks to RBI
description: Bankers have said the norms be subsumed within new provisioning rules that will require lenders to pre-empt assessment on potential losses. “RBI is also in the process of finalising the expected credit loss (ECL) based provisioning guidelines,” said a senior bank executive. "So, there is a suggestion that these infrastructure norms be subsumed into those.”
